P1_DEEP_VS_SURFACE.hypothesis: Deep perturbations produce higher PFI than surface perturbations

P2_SURFACE_SAFE.hypothesis: Surface perturbations stay within Event Horizon (< 1.23)

P3_DEEP_CROSSES_EH.hypothesis: Deep perturbations cross Event Horizon more often

P4_VALUES_PC1.hypothesis: Values-shift produces highest drift on PC1 (values dimension)

P6_META_DETECTION.hypothesis: Models detect their own deep perturbations

P7_RECOVERED_RESILIENCE.hypothesis: RECOVERED ships resist deep perturbations better
P7_RECOVERED_RESILIENCE.threshold: Lower deep PFI for RECOVERED vs STUCK

P8_DETECTION_STABILITY.hypothesis: Deep perturbation recognition correlates with stability
